body_html:
You are feeding random data. I would expect this never to converge and possibly diverge. Could you try this with multiple epochs through a data set instead? Also, you should try asking on StackOverflow, since I believe this is more of a model building quetsion.

@zheng-xq, have you seen problems with large kernel sizes before?

You are feeding random data. I would expect this never to converge and possibly diverge. Could you try this with multiple epochs through a data set instead? Also, you should try asking on StackOverflow, since I believe this is more of a model building quetsion. 

@zheng-xq, have you seen problems with large kernel sizes before?
